group.description:
http://www.humansubspecies.com Human Origins, Paleontology, Anthropology from a right-wing perspective.  Conservatives and libertarians are welcomed here. Race Realism without the hate.  Please no NeoNazi crap, White Supremacists, Jew haters.  You will be moderated.  

GLOSSARY OF TERMS USED HERE:

Australopithecines - Lucy - Afarensis, Anamensis, Africanus 3.9 million to 2.4 million years ago
Denisovans - Altai, Southern, 600k to 10kya, mainly in Asia, Melanesia
Ardipithecus (Ardi - Ethiopia), Sahelanthropus tchadensis (Chad), Hobbits/Homo floresiensis.  Popular Paleo-anthropologists: John "Johnny Boy" Hawkes - Univ. of Wisconsin, Lee Berger - South Africa, discover of both Aust. Sediba and Homo naled, Chris Stringer of the London Museum of Natural History, (Fatty) Sarah Tishkoff of the Univ. of Pennsylvania, Joshua Akey - geneticist, Svante Paabo, Johannes Krause of the Max Plank Inst. Leipzig, Germany, David Reich.
group.description_html:
http://www.humansubspecies.com Human Origins, Paleontology, Anthropology from a right-wing perspective. Conservatives and libertarians are welcomed here. Race Realism without the hate. Please no NeoNazi crap, White Supremacists, Jew haters. You will be moderated.

GLOSSARY OF TERMS USED HERE:

Australopithecines - Lucy - Afarensis, Anamensis, Africanus 3.9 million to 2.4 million years ago
Denisovans - Altai, Southern, 600k to 10kya, mainly in Asia, Melanesia
Ardipithecus (Ardi - Ethiopia), Sahelanthropus tchadensis (Chad), Hobbits/Homo floresiensis. Popular Paleo-anthropologists: John "Johnny Boy" Hawkes - Univ. of Wisconsin, Lee Berger - South Africa, discover of both Aust. Sediba and Homo naled, Chris Stringer of the London Museum of Natural History, (Fatty) Sarah Tishkoff of the Univ. of Pennsylvania, Joshua Akey - geneticist, Svante Paabo, Johannes Krause of the Max Plank Inst. Leipzig, Germany, David Reich.
group.title: Human Evolution

card.description:
Jack Scarlett is not short of money but needs the adrenalin rush provided by flirting with high-risk encounters; in his case several at a time.
Programmed to kill, the X-rated former mercenary is forced into a no holds barred conflict in which no prisoners are taken. Determined to stop his high-octane lethal feud is Detective Chief Inspector Eric Jansen.
Predictably, the inquisition starts in the city‚Äôs police headquarters. There, the veteran cop finds nailing a jelly to the wall far easier than stopping a merc‚Äô on a mission.
In the predator‚Äôs cross-hairs are the most sinister but successful sinners of Liverpool‚Äôs underworld. ‚ÄòMess with the best, die like the rest‚Äô appears to be Jack Scarlett‚Äôs maxim as after being crossed in love and trust he evens the score.
The killer question is, can Detective Chief Inspector Eric Jansen stop Jack Scarlett, and does he really want to. That is for you to decide.
card.title: The Stigma Enigma

_source.content: THE STIGMA ENIGMA Liverpool author Michael Walsh. card.title: Developing: AG Garland to name Special Counsel to Investigate Trump

_source.content: https://technofog.substack.com/p/developing-ag-garland-to-name-specialWhat of Jack Smith‚Äôs past? Here‚Äôs some background on his connections to Lois Lerner and his involvement in the IRS targeting scandal back in the early 2010s:    In their letter to Attorney General Eric Holder, the Committee said, ‚ÄúThe Justice Department convened a meeting with former IRS official Lois Lerner in October 2010 to discuss how the IRS could assist in the criminal enforcement of campaign-finance laws against politically active nonprofits. This meeting was arranged at the direction of Public Integrity Section Chief Jack Smith.‚ÄùAs to January 6, Smith is tasked to ‚Äúconduct the ongoing investigation into whether any person or entity violated the law in connection with efforts to interfere with the lawful transfer of power following the 2020 presidential election or the certification of the Electoral College vote held on or about January 6, 2021.‚ÄùWith respect to the Mar-a-Lago raid, Smith ‚Äúis further authorized to conduct that investigation . . . and any matters that arise or may arise directly from that investigation.‚ÄùHere is the appointing document:https://www.justice.gov/opa/press-release/file/1552896/download
_source.contentraw:
https://technofog.substack.com/p/developing-ag-garland-to-name-special
What of Jack Smith‚Äôs past? Here‚Äôs some background on his connections to Lois Lerner and his involvement in the IRS targeting scandal back in the
early 2010s:
In their letter to Attorney General Eric Holder, the Committee said, ‚ÄúThe Justice Department convened a meeting with former IRS official Lois
Lerner in October 2010 to discuss how the IRS could assist in the criminal enforcement of campaign-finance laws against politically active
nonprofits. This meeting was arranged at the direction of Public Integrity Section Chief Jack Smith.‚Äù
As to January 6, Smith is tasked to ‚Äúconduct the ongoing investigation into whether any person or entity violated the law in connection with
efforts to interfere with the lawful transfer of power following the 2020 presidential election or the certification of the Electoral College vote
held on or about January 6, 2021.‚Äù
With respect to the Mar-a-Lago raid, Smith ‚Äúis further authorized to conduct that investigation . . . and any matters that arise or may arise
directly from that investigation.‚Äù
Here is the appointing document:
https://www.justice.gov/opa/press-release/file/1552896/download

_source.content: Someone becoming born again (or ‚Äúborn from above‚Äù ‚Äì or ‚Äúborn anew‚Äù ‚Äì John 3:1-6 ‚Äì https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) and allowing The Holy Spirit to guide one into all truth (John 14:26, John 16:13) is where true emotional healing ultimately lies.People and their own efforts outside of John 15:5 accomplish nothing in the long run besides multiple bandages, false religions or cults.JOHN 3:3-6 (NLT)Jesus replied, ‚ÄúI tell you the truth, unless you are born again, you cannot see the Kingdom of God.‚Äù‚ÄúWhat do you mean?‚Äù exclaimed Nicodemus. ‚ÄúHow can an old man go back into his mother‚Äôs womb and be born again?‚ÄùJesus replied, ‚ÄúI assure you, no one can enter the Kingdom of God without being born of water and the Spirit. Humans can reproduce only human life, but the Holy Spirit gives birth to spiritual life.(‚Äù)JOHN 15:5 (NLT)‚ÄúYes, I am the vine; you are the branches. Those who remain in me, and I in them, will produce much fruit. For apart from me you can do nothing.(‚Äù)JOHN 16:13 (NLT)When the Spirit of truth comes, he will guide you into all truth. He will not speak on his own but will tell you what he has heard. He will tell you about the future.https://www.biblegateway.com/(SIDE NOTE - That ‚Äúremaining‚Äù mentioned in John 15:5, above, is automatic in one born again.)A ‚Äúcult‚Äù is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù, but that‚Äôs another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There‚Äôs ALWAYS someone else as a ‚Äúleader‚Äù. Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It‚Äôs cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.An incorrect version of ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù exists in ANY cult which includes those ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù people. It‚Äôs totally impossible to ‚Äúearn a gift‚Äù. No ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù in false religions. One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn‚Äôt teach anything like either ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù or ‚Äúreligion‚Äù (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything‚Äù. (‚ÄúThe Gospel ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword: ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We‚Äôre under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren‚Äôt robots. Forever‚Äôs a long time.
_source.contentraw:
Someone becoming born again (or ‚Äúborn from above‚Äù ‚Äì or ‚Äúborn anew‚Äù ‚Äì John 3:1-6 ‚Äì https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) and allowing The Holy Spirit to guide one into all truth (John 14:26, John 16:13) is where true emotional healing ultimately lies.
People and their own efforts outside of John 15:5 accomplish nothing in the long run besides multiple bandages, false religions or cults.

JOHN 3:3-6 (NLT)
Jesus replied, ‚ÄúI tell you the truth, unless you are born again, you cannot see the Kingdom of God.‚Äù
‚ÄúWhat do you mean?‚Äù exclaimed Nicodemus. ‚ÄúHow can an old man go back into his mother‚Äôs womb and be born again?‚Äù
Jesus replied, ‚ÄúI assure you, no one can enter the Kingdom of God without being born of water and the Spirit. Humans can reproduce only human life, but the Holy Spirit gives birth to spiritual life.(‚Äù)
JOHN 15:5 (NLT)
‚ÄúYes, I am the vine; you are the branches. Those who remain in me, and I in them, will produce much fruit. For apart from me you can do nothing.(‚Äù)
JOHN 16:13 (NLT)
When the Spirit of truth comes, he will guide you into all truth. He will not speak on his own but will tell you what he has heard. He will tell you about the future.
https://www.biblegateway.com/

(SIDE NOTE - That ‚Äúremaining‚Äù mentioned in John 15:5, above, is automatic in one born again.)

A ‚Äúcult‚Äù is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù, but that‚Äôs another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There‚Äôs ALWAYS someone else as a ‚Äúleader‚Äù. Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It‚Äôs cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.

An incorrect version of ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù exists in ANY cult which includes those ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù people. It‚Äôs totally impossible to ‚Äúearn a gift‚Äù. No ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù in false religions. One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn‚Äôt teach anything like either ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù or ‚Äúreligion‚Äù (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).

By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything‚Äù. (‚ÄúThe Gospel ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword: ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We‚Äôre under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren‚Äôt robots. Forever‚Äôs a long time.
